nodes.description: 2001年5月，哈马斯分子在以色列哈沙隆购物中心发动爆炸袭击

nodes.support_text: during Passover 2002 and at the Hasharon Mall in May 2001

nodes.description: 2002年5月，以色列国防军在对哈马斯的‘铁盾行动’中逮捕赛义德
nodes.support_text: arrested by Israel Defense Forces soldiers during Operation Defensive Shield in May 2002

nodes.description: 赛义德在审讯中被要求命令哈马斯成员将氰化物交给以色列
nodes.support_text: during his interrogation he was asked by security authorities to have Hamas operatives hand over the cyanide to Israel

nodes.description: 赛义德因在叙利亚接收爆炸物和资金被追加定罪
nodes.support_text: was also convicted last month of receiving explosive materials from Hamas operatives in Syria

nodes.description: 赛义德因多项恐怖主义罪名被以色列法院判处终身监禁
nodes.support_text: Prosecutor Zamira Goldner will ask the court to give Al-Sayed consecutive life sentences
